Welcome to Ireaneus Linux Cheat Sheets webpage

Linux command line cheat sheets website

View on GitHub

Search for packages

pip search SomePackage

Install some packages

pip install SomePackage

Output and install packages in a requirement file

pip freeze > requirements.txt pip install -r requirements.txt

Show details of a package

pip show SomePackage

List outdated packages

pip list –outdated

Upgrade all outdated packages, thanks to http://stackoverflow.com/a/3452888

pip freeze –local | grep -v ‘^-e’ | cut -d = -f 1 | xargs -n1 pip install -U

Install specific version of a package

pip install -I SomePackage1==1.1.0 ‘SomePackage2>=1.0.4’
